about_the_game: Guide the renegade Mecha pilot Tasha through the post-apocalyptic world. Danger is lurking everywhere, but not everyone you encounter will be an enemy. Talk, hack, dig and fight your way through the wastelands in this 30-minute demo of Rogue Mech.

content_descriptors.notes: Displays of destruction. Violence against machines, implied violence against humans. Some strong language, some sexual innuendos. May show occasional usage of alcohol or tobacco.

detailed_description: Guide the renegade Mecha pilot Tasha through the post-apocalyptic world. Danger is lurking everywhere, but not everyone you encounter will be an enemy. Talk, hack, dig and fight your way through the wastelands in this 30-minute demo of Rogue Mech.
name: Rogue Mech Demo
short_description: Pilot your trusty Phoenix in this isometric, post-apocalyptic mecha survival game with base building and farming elements. Trade, plant, hack, dig, talk and fight your way through the wastelands. If you survive, you might be able to restore a little green to this ash-ridden world.
